metadata.title: CVE-2024-36919 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description:
In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved: scsi:bnx2fc: Remove spin_lock_bh while releasing resources after upload Thesession resources are used by FW and driver when session is offloaded, oncesession is uploaded these resources are not used. The lock is not requiredas these fields won't be used any longer. The offload and upload calls aresequential, hence lock is not required.
